snippet: Programs for your smartphone can recreate favorite computer games from your childhood, apply nostalgic effects to your photos and even turn your MP3 collection into a virtual stack of vinyl records.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights nostalgia apps for smartphones and tablets; notes they can recreate favorite computer games from childhood, apply nostalgic effects to photos and turn an MP3 collection into a virtual stack of vinyl records.
lead_paragraph: Programs for your smartphone can recreate favorite computer games from your childhood, apply nostalgic effects to your photos and even turn your MP3 collection into a virtual stack of vinyl records.

headline.print_headline: Apps That Recall a Time Before There Were Apps
headline.seo: Apps That Recall a Time Before There Were Apps
headline.main: Apps That Recall a Time Before There Were Apps
